name: 黃子坤
objective:
講授環境所面臨的挑戰及永續發展(Sustainable Development)的理論及演變。經由對環境問題的一般瞭解，分析現有之綠色設計政策、綠色設計管理及綠色產品生命週期。
首先針對地球資源短缺及氣候變遷兩項議題探討問題的真相。其次，定義永續發展的的內涵，以 Carbon Footprint 及 Life Cycle Assessment的概念探索產品生產與使用的環境衝擊(environmental impact) 。
在實務上，本課程將分析可行的方案來落實reduce, reuse 及 recycle （3R）三原則於產品設計程序之中。也會嘗試應用‘Product Service System’ (PSS) 及‘Sharing Economy’ 理論發展低環境衝擊的產品與服務系統。

This course explores theories of Sustainable Development and their application in design. 
A general review of environment issues and their problems, followed by studies on Life Cycle Assessment  (LCA) . 
Studies of exploring guidelines will be carried out for achieving implementation of principles of reduce, reuse and recycle in process of product design, and finally fulfill the goals of increased efficiency, fewer toxics, less pollution, and healthier natural systems.
Introducing ‘Product Service System’ (PSS) as a function-oriented business model. 
Introducing ‘Sharing Economy’ as a collaborative consumption business model.

Sharing Economy
